## Description
Brief description of changes made in this pull request.

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Testing
- [ ] All tests pass locally
- [ ] New tests added for new functionality
- [ ] Manual testing performed
- [ ] Integration tests with AWS services (if applicable)

## Checklist
- [ ] Code follows project style guidelines (Black, Ruff, MyPy)
- [ ] Self-review of code completed
- [ ] Documentation updated (README.md, docstrings, etc.)
- [ ] Commit messages follow conventional commit format
- [ ] No breaking changes without proper version bump
- [ ] Sensitive information not included in code or commits

## AWS Testing (if applicable)
- [ ] Tested with real AWS credentials (in non-production environment)
- [ ] Verified with different VPC configurations
- [ ] Tested with various AWS regions

## Additional Notes
Any additional information that reviewers should know.
